verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
By the fig and the olive.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being in the best design.
Then We reduced him to the lowest of the low.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.verseStringB: Except those who believe and do good deeds—they will have an unending reward.
So what makes you deny the religion?
Is Allah not the Wisest of Judges?
